title: Introduction
content: ABOUT THE AUTHOR Hello Author: Le Vu Xuan An - FCJ Cloud Engineer Ambassador Training major: Software Technology - Faculty of Information Technology, Ho Chi Minh City University of Technical Education Development orientation: Cloud Engineer Training course start time: June 19, 2024 INTRODUCING THE WORK FCJ records FCJ notes is a theoretical document about Cloud that I personally researched on my journey to the cloud at Amazon Web Serice. Documents include theoretical knowledge and practical lab exercises that I have personally researched The document is in the process of being completed and updated, so it is inevitable that there will be omissions. Personally, I hope to receive contribution from everyone. Layout of the document The document includes 03 parts: Content section Practice part Experiences learned on the journey to the clouds
